snippet.title: Oddinary Highway – Gameplay September 2019
snippet.description:
Oddinary Highway is a retrofuturistic shoot'em up with rogue-like elements and constantly changing game mechanics.

Video contains gameplay at different levels, locations and multiple loops (loop is a set of all levels). Also, it displays how different weirdonium leaks (game mechanics changes or affixes) affect gameplay.

These affixes are applied by following rules:
– New affix is added when Player proceeds to next level (previous affix is removed)
– Once loop (all levels) is finished and Player proceeds to next loop, permanent affix is added and stays active till the end of new loop.

Timecodes:

00:00:00 – Game start, Intro Level in City World, Level 0
00:00:30 – Transition to Main loop of the game and the first level – Sand World, Level 1. Level-scope affix is applied.
00:02:42 – Transition to second level – Ocean World, Level 1. Level-scope affix is applied.
00:05:38 – Transition to third level and final level of the loop – City World, Level 1. Level-scope affix is applied.
00:07:00 – Transition to next loop of the game and again to Sand World, Level 1. Loop-scope affix is applied and should remain till the end of the current loop.
00:09:30 – Transition to second level of the loop – Ocean World, Level 1. Level-scope affix is applied, previously added loop-scope affix remains.
